# Pull Request Checklist

Below is a checklist for you to review your changes while opening a pull request. PRs that do not meet these checks may be requested for changes or closed.

- [ ] I have searched this repository and existing PRs and have ensured that this is not a duplicate.
- [ ] This submission does not have promotional or engagement-driven social posts, vendor marketing and product pitches.
- [ ] This submission is not paywalled or behind restricted access.
- [ ] This submission does not violate any copyright and is compatible with this repository's [license](https://github.com/omkar-foss/awesome-animal-care/blob/main/license).
- [ ] This PR contains a single resource or a single, focused change.
- [ ] This PR has a useful title and the [description below](#description) has a short note about my changes.
- [ ] The resource addition uses the required format: `[Resource title](resource link) - Some resource description.`
- [ ] The resource addition is placed at the correct position in the appropriate category, preserving alphabetical ordering.
- [ ] The resource description is concise, descriptive and not a marketing tagline.
- [ ] The resource description starts with a capital, ends with a period, and does not start with `A` or `An`.
- [ ] Spelling and grammar have been checked, and the changes contain no trailing whitespaces.
- [ ] I agree to follow this repository's [Contributor Code of Conduct](https://github.com/omkar-foss/awesome-animal-care/blob/main/code_of_conduct.md).
- [ ] _Optional:_ I have proposed a new category or a structural change in this PR.

## Description

Add a short note here about your changes.
